name: Slinfinite Rhythm
description:
WELCOME ON SLINFINITE RYTHM
This concept was made for the MiniJam 113 - Final Boss (stuck in a loop)

How does the loop is in the concept
With an infinite loop inside a rhythm game where you can't defeat the boss.
The key come randomly during infinite time.
If you die, the gameover counter grow by 1.

How to play

RYTHM BOX
The bottom screen of the game will contain your main rhythm box.


You will need to hit the correct key display when they are close to the middle.
(It's represent by the key going inside it's empty box)

Always on this main rhythm box you can use UP/DOWN arrow to select the line.
Pressing the correct key will give you bonus, but pressing the correct key and selecting the correct line will give you more bonus.

PLAYER INFO
The top left of the screen is your information as a player.


HP: Drop by 10 if you miss key
MP: Drop by 10 if you miss key and line | Grow by 5 if you get the correct line
GAMEOVER: Grow by 1 if you hit 0HP and give you back full HP
COMBOMAX: The max combo you have done
COMBO: Grow by 1 if you hit the correct key

PLAYER ACTION
With the LEFT/RIGHT arrow you can choose an action and press SPACE to use it.

Each action consume your mana and the effect are display bellow your player info.


You got a total of 4 action
ATK: Deal 5 damage multiply by the current combo
DEF: 3 second of invulnerability where you can't loose HP
HEAL: Heal yourself for 30HP
FLEE: Freeze the rhythm box for 3 second

BOSS INFO
The boss information are visible on the top right of the screen


HP: no information
MP: Loose MP during boss action, recover thought time automaticly
DAMAGE: The damage you made to the boss (your global score)

BOSS ACTION
The boss as automatic action that are random.
When an action come out, you got 3 second to prepare yourself


The number on the right is the reminding time before the action is launch
The boss got 2 action
ATK: Deal 20 damage to the player
DEF: 3 second of invulnerability  where the boss can't take damage
